DRUM SHOTGUN

At T2, this weapon can make two attacks at a time, targeting either the same character or two different ones. At T3, it can make three attacks at a time.

CRUSH TARGETING

A character within line of sight and Sensors gains +3 difficulty to attack against any character other than the Goliath until the start of the Goliath’s next turn.

HEAVY FRAME

The Goliath can’t be pushed, pulled, knocked Prone, or knocked back by smaller characters.

GUARDIAN

Allied characters can use the Goliath for hard cover.

SIEGE ARMOR

The Goliath has Resistance to all damage from attacks that originate beyond range 3.

POWER KNUCKLE

A character within range 2 must pass a Hull save or take {4/5/6} Kinetic damage, be pushed 5 spaces directly away from the Goliath, and knocked Prone.
